# Copilot Instructions

## Project Context
This is a Next.js application for rug prompt generation and AI image processing. The application:

- Processes CSV files containing rug product data
- Generates AI prompts for rug visualization
- Downloads and converts images to base64
- Integrates with Google Gemini API for batch processing
- Uses the Vercel AI SDK for AI operations

## Key Technologies
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Vercel AI SDK
- Google Gemini API
- CSV processing libraries
- File upload and processing capabilities

## Code Style Preferences
- Use TypeScript with strict type checking
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Use server actions for file processing
- Implement proper error handling and loading states
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Follow React best practices with hooks and components
